diff_act: 4.The driver must confirm the entry or overwrite after entering data manually.
5.Allow manual data entry or overwriting by the driver when the train is stationary.
6.Enable automatic train data entry when the train is stationary if supported by ETCS equipment.
7.Allow the driver to consult the train data at any time once it is entered.
8.Confirm all entered or automatically retrieved train data at the start of the Data Entry process
9.Consult current train data at any time

regen.absent_element: validation of the entered train data
regen.new_specification: The system shall validate the entered train data before allowing confirmation by the driver.

regen.absent_element: a specific action for confirming manual data entry or overwriting
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure the driver confirms manual data entry or overwrite while stationary.

regen.absent_element: Driver confirmation after manual or overwritten data entry
regen.new_specification: The driver must confirm any manual or overwritten data entry once completed, ensuring accurate data entry before proceeding to the next step.

label: The driver shall be able to consult train data when the train is stationary or moving.
absence: action of consulting train data when moving
